TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Color")]
[<System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty("Color")>]

summary.span: 表示一个通用对话框，该对话框显示可用的颜色以及允许用户定义自定义颜色的控件。

span.span: Represents a common dialog box that displays available colors along with controls that enable the user to define custom colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用继承的成员 才能创建此特定的公共对话框。The inherited member must be invoked to create this specific common dialog box. 可以重写以实现特定的对话框挂钩功能。 can be overridden to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. 使用 检索用户选择的颜色。Use to retrieve the color selected by the user. 创建的实例时 ，某些读/写属性被设置为初始值。When you create an instance of , some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何创建新的 。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 此示例需要从现有窗体中调用方法，该窗体具有 并 放置在该窗体上。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. [!code-cpp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ColorDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ColorDialog Example/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以使用该对话框定义自定义颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can use the dialog box to define custom colors.

value.span: 如果用户可定义自定义颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can define custom colors; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为时 `false` ，对话框中的关联按钮将被禁用，并且用户无法访问对话框中的 "自定义颜色" 控件。When set to `false`, the associated button in the dialog box is disabled and the user cannot access the custom colors control in the dialog box. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何创建新的 。The following example illustrates the creation of new . 此示例需要从现有窗体中调用方法，该窗体具有 并 放置在该窗体上。This example requires that the method is called from within an existing form that has a and placed on it. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对话框是否显示基本颜色集中可用的所有颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors.

value.span: 如果对话框显示基本颜色集中可用的所有颜色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the dialog box displays all available colors in the set of basic colors; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化的 设置 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不 允许用户设置自定义颜色，但允许显示完整的基本颜色集。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 当您将 属性设置为时 `false` ，它会允许在颜色为256或更低的系统上显示与其他颜色组合的颜色。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 该示例还演示如何设置 属性并处理 对话框的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeColorDialog` 在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例要求按钮的 `Click` 事件连接到在示例中定义的事件处理程序方法。This example requires that the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对话框中显示的自定义颜色集。

span.span: Gets or sets the set of custom colors shown in the dialog box.

value.span: 对话框显示的自定义颜色集。

span.span: A set of custom colors shown by the dialog box.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以创建自己的一组自定义颜色。Users can create their own set of custom colors. 这些颜色包含在 BGR (蓝色、绿色、红色) 创建颜色所需的值。These colors are contained in an composed of the BGR (blue, green, red) values necessary to create the color. 有关此数据的结构的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information on the structure of this data, see . 仅当设置为时，才能定义自定义颜色 `true` 。Custom colors can only be defined if is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将表示自定义颜色的类型的数组添加 到 。The following code example shows how to add an array of type representing custom colors to . 此示例要求在中从运行代码 。This example requires that the code is run from within a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialog CustomColors Property Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用于创建自定义颜色的控件在对话框打开时是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the controls used to create custom colors are visible when the dialog box is opened.

value.span: 如果自定义颜色控件在对话框打开时是可用的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the custom color controls are available when the dialog box is opened; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在第一次打开对话框时，自定义颜色控件不可见。By default, the custom color controls are not visible when the dialog box is first opened. 您必须单击该 `Custom Colors` 按钮才能显示它们。You must click the `Custom Colors` button to display them. > [!NOTE] > 如果 为 `false` ，则 不起作用。If is `false`, then has no effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此方法使用 来防止不受信任的代码调用该方法; 只有直接调用方才需要具有 权限。This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; only the immediate caller is required to have permission. 如果你的代码可从部分受信任的代码调用，则不要将用户输入传递给 不带验证的类方法。If your code can be called from partially trusted code, do not pass user input to class methods without validation. 有关使用成员的重要限制 `LinkDemand` ，请参阅 [Demand 与 LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5)。For important limitations on using the `LinkDemand` member, see [Demand vs. LinkDemand](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ab877f2-70f4-4e0d-8116-943999dfe8f5). 此属性还使用 安全特性; 若要重写此成员，派生类必须具有 `CustomPermission` 权限。This property also uses the security attribute; to override this member, the derived class must have the `CustomPermission` permission.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对话框是否限制用户只选择纯色。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box will restrict users to selecting solid colors only.

value.span: 如果用户只能选择纯色，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if users can select only solid colors; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性适用于具有256或更少颜色的系统。This property is applicable to systems with 256 or fewer colors. 在这些类型的系统上，某些颜色是其他颜色的复合。On these types of systems, some colors are composites of others. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化的 设置 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates initializing a setting the , properties. 不 允许用户设置自定义颜色，但允许显示完整的基本颜色集。The does not enable the user to set a custom color, but it enables the full set of basic colors be displayed. 当您将 属性设置为时 `false` ，它会允许在颜色为256或更低的系统上显示与其他颜色组合的颜色。When you set the property to `false`, it enables the display of colors that are combinations of other colors on systems with 256 or less colors. 该示例还演示了如何设置 属性和处理 对话框的事件。The example also shows setting the property and handling a event for a dialog box. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeColorDialog` 在窗体的构造函数或方法中调用方法 `Load` 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form and call the `InitializeColorDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 此示例需要将 `Click` 按钮的事件连接到在示例中定义的事件处理程序方法。This example requires the `Click` event of the button is connected to the event-handler method defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ColorDialogHelp/VB/form1.vb#1)]
